thought: To craft pink_stained_glass, I first need to craft pink_dye, which requires red_dye and white_dye. I have white_dye in slot 18, but I need to craft red_dye. I can craft red_dye from a red_tulip, which I have in slot 42. I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1
